thread.section_title: Walsh Brothers Shoes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Walsh Brothers Shoes | walshbrothersshoes.ie
thread.title: Mairead
thread.title_full: Walsh Brothers Shoes reviewed by Mairead

author: Mairead
title: Mairead
text: Great service. Ordered boots- they arrived the next day! Boots unfortunately were too small but when I got in touch with them they contacted supplier to see if they could source my size. Size completely out of stock. So I had to return them (free) and I was refunded within 2 days. This was what I would call a perfect service. If I tried shoes that I knew fit in a shop now I would nearly go home and order from Walsh shoes online their service is so good!
